General.Name: Shin Shin Co Ltd
General.Description: Shin Shin Co Ltd. operates department stores and underground streets in Taiwan. The company offers food, cosmetics, leather shoes, leather goods, body shop products, bread, coffee, garden tea house, casual clothing, daily groceries, denim clothing, accessories, ladies' clothing, and men's and women's underwear. It also operates supermarkets, restaurants, and parking lots. The company was founded in 1960 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 247, Linsen North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10447
